snippet: An enigmatic preacher with thousands of followers is demanding the government’s ouster, the top court has ordered the arrest of the prime minister and violence is surging.
abstract: Pakistan, barely one year after fears of possible military coup plunged it into political chaos, is in crisis again; country is besieged on multiple fronts by forces that threaten government ahead of elections; enigmatic preacher Muhammad Tahir-ul Qadri with thousands of followers is demanding government’s ouster, top court has ordered arrest of the prime minister and violence is surging.

byline.contributor: Salman Masood contributed reporting from Islamabad.

lead_paragraph: An enigmatic preacher with thousands of followers is demanding the government’s ouster, the top court has ordered the arrest of the prime minister and violence is surging.

headline.seo: Pakistani Supreme Court Orders Arrest of Prime Minister
headline.main: Internal Forces Besiege Pakistan Ahead of Voting
headline.print_headline: Internal Forces Besiege Pakistan Ahead of Voting
